thread.title: Karrueche Tran Files Restraining Order Against Chris Brown: He Threatened to Kill Me!
thread.title_full: Karrueche Tran Files Restraining Order Against Chris Brown: He Threatened to Kill Me!

author: Jessica Bennett
title: Karrueche Tran Files Restraining Order Against Chris Brown: He Threatened to Kill Me!
text:
February 21, 2017 by Jessica Bennett 0 Shares Advertisement 
Chris Brown and ex-girlfriend Karrueche Tran haven’t had the most civil of breakups, as the pair constantly take digs at each other via social media. 
According to Karrueche however, Breezy has taken things too far, forcing her to file a restraining order against the “Turn Up the Music” singer after he allegedly threatened to take her life. 

The 28-year-old model recently took legal measures to protect herself from the R&B star, filing a restraining order and telling her judge that Chris “told a few people that he was going to kill me,” according to TMZ. 
Credit: Instagram 
To back up her claims, the young actress also revealed the superstar was physically abusive towards her, claiming he punched her “in the stomach twice.” 
She also claims the “Loyal” singer pushed her down a flight of stairs. 

Legal documents also allege Chris threatened to harm Karrueche’s friends, saying the 27-year-old previously threw a drink at one of them with no remorse. 
Chris has been ordered to stay at least 100 yards away from Karrueche, her mom and her brother. 

Ironically, he jokingly called himself a “stalker” last month, admitting he’s crazy and can’t let go of past lovers. 
A post shared by Baller Alert (@balleralert) on Jan 31, 2017 at 6:02am PST 
Do you think Chris has a serious problem, or is Karrueche exaggerating? Sound off below.
